description: An illustration of a person sitting cross-legged on a yellow yoga mat, seen from behind, with their fingers lightly touching their thumbs and resting on their knees; the title of the puzzle ("Take a deep breath") implies that the person may be meditating. The person has very short grayish-blue hair and is wearing a grayish-blue t-shirt and pants. A splotch of dark sky lies before the person with three four-pointed stars surrounding their head.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
